idea-plugin.name: Copy/Paste Stack
idea-plugin.description:
Adds a tool window of copy history items, similar to the standard copy history built-in, but possible to be kept persistently open and with some additional features:
  • Copy/paste stack provides an unlimited long list of of copied string items, from the current and recent sessions. Copy/paste stack caches its content, allowing you to keep copied items for as long as needed (instead of limiting their availability to the current editing session).
  • The full text of selected copied items can optionally be previewed in an editable text pane.
  • One or multiple selected items can be inserted into the editor via [ENTER] key, [SPACE] or double click.
  • Items are automatically trimmed from surrounding whitespace.
  • The list of copied items can be sorted chronologically and alphabetically
  • Previously copied items can be re-copied to the regular clipboard again
  • Items in the copy stack can be color tagged with a yellow, green or red background
  • When pasting items back into the editor, they can be wrapped with a prefix and postfix string, and a delimiter when pasting multiple items at once.
